column1: 0137|01:37|Major Yun appeared at General Castleton's elbow
column2: and handed an interface to the base leader. General Castleton took it
column3:
his face darkening and his frown deepening as he read it.
"What is it?" she asked when he looked up. "At 01:37 this morning
column4: an encrypted message was sent from inside the base."
